website_summaries.verdict: This is a fast, reliable modem for those who want the convenience of a built-in Wi-Fi router.
pros: The modem can handle ISP speeds up to 300 Mbps, which covers most available cable ISP packages
The built-in router eliminates the clutter of needing both a modem and router
Offers speeds up to 1.9 Gbps, enough download power to handle multiple devices
As with all Linksys products, this model's compatibility with most ISPs is a big benefit
cons: May experience lag or connectivity issues when used with graphics-intensive games or large families with a high number of devices

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This device will not hold an Internet connection. Most configuration items have to be done by the Cable company as this device is not User-configurable. When having issues the Cable co. blamed Linksys and Linksys blamed the Cable co. so I was never able to get a resolution as to why this device kept dropping the Internet connection. VERY, VERY FRUSTRATING so I sent it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Arris surfboard installed like a dream and was easy to use right out ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine also constantly disconnected about 1-2x every single day. After playing around with it for about a week and a half, I returned this puppy and bought a ARRIS SURFboard AC1900. The Arris surfboard installed like a dream and was easy to use right out of the box. I took a chance because of the Linksys name but don't do it if you have Comcast. This thing blows!
customer_reviews.author: Furry Robot

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. Breakdown once the other day. No support nor new firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product with lots of bugs (DHCP reservation is not working, 2.4Ghz stop working in a day and need reboots, lots of drop signal, file sharing is outdated, DNS relay dies and need reboots, poor signal strength, ). The modem and landline parts are reliable and this is it. I can get better and reliable WiFi from my neighbor. What a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lum

customer_reviews.title: Loses signal far too frequently
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed in this modem. Not sure if it's a defective unit or not but I have to reboot itseveral times per day. I got so frustrated that I just put it back in the box, bought another brand & is this one now collecting dust. Save yourself time & money & buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY ARTEFACT
customer_reviews.text: this modem-router worked very well por a period of time. It stop working and only one led is on. It is like it never finishes to startup. I am glad I purchased the protection plan, hope SquareTrade honors its promise. I am already very frustrated with all this mess. Linksys used to deliver high quality products hit it the case no more.
customer_reviews.author: TXJURGEN

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: i must’ve lucked out as I’ve yet to have a single issue with this router. I’ve had steady signals both ether and WiFi with no drops in speed. For the price I paid and what I’ll save from CC ripping me off I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: imsfan

customer_reviews.title: Works better than Comcast/Xfinity router
customer_reviews.text: Got this after finally deciding paying the rental fee each month was a rip off. Great buy and price for a student budget. Works better than the Xfinity router I had--used to get spotty service in my bedroom (router was placed in the middle of my small one bedroom apartment) but now I have full speed everywhere in my 3rd story apartment and even carries down to my car. Does take some time to set up but a quick call to Xfinity and navigation made it simple. Disconnected my old router and set this one up with it working in about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK - BUY SEPARATE ROUTER AND MODEM
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Would have given 0 stars if I could. This router didn't work from the start. The wifi kept dropping out. I had to reset the router at least once a day. I tried every workaround and nothing helped. Even after a reset the wifi signal was poor and inconsistent. I've spend hours on the technical support line with Linksys and the only remedy is to provide a replacement of exactly the same item. The support from Linksys is a very poor. THIS IS NEW PRODUCT AND DOESN'T WORK PROPERLY. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, Finally returned
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. The service plan is 100MBPS, The speeds it showed with wired 70MBPS and wireless 52 MBPS also my HTC phone keeps dropping when I connect to this wifi network. waste of time
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you enjoy slow internet.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Modem/Router all in one for almost a year now. Let me walk you through the experience. The setup feature leaves a lot to be desired. The website for tech help is a joke and so is the customer service if you have to call. My modem/router works great for about 2 hours a day. Then I have to go power cycle it if I intend to use the internet. Netflix stream, ha you wish. Gaming is a joke. I saw a lot of people online with my same problem. The only fix I can find is buy another router/modem. If I was you I would keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Router!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased!! House of 5, each person with phone, tablet and laptop all on the wifi, excellent coverage ~80ft in all directions/rooms Ive owned/configured almost exclusively Linksys Routers for the last 16yrs, thry are the easiest to configure and this tiger has geeat coverage/stability/customizability!
customer_reviews.author: radio guy

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars I would. It worked for the first 2 months without any issues, then it started acting up so I would reset it and it would be fine for a couple days then came the day that it would work for about 20 minutes and quit working. I wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone it’s a pile of junk and I spent well over 100$ on it and of course my return window is closed
customer_reviews.author: Duke James Crone

customer_reviews.title: Love having my own WiFi modem so I don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love having my own WiFi modem so I don't have to pay fees associated with renting one from the cable company. Has been a seamless switch and haven't had any issues with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jagator60

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have Spectrum Cable internet and over 6 devices connected (TV, DVR, PS4, computers and smartphones). Works great with our internet provider and devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with LG products
customer_reviews.text: In shopping for routers the linksys company fails to mention that their products do not connect via Wi-Fi to LG products. My phone does not stay connected neither did our smart tv. I contacted tech support and they replied that is something that do not support for product. I waited to see if there was an update, there has not been. The tv stays connected via lan cable, however the cell phone, not just mine but others we have had over , still has the issue. Why a company simply has another not compatible with their products I do not know. Just keep this in mind
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and control what is connected
customer_reviews.text: get one, save you money and works sharp fast and delivery what you looking for, speed and more speed. easy to set up and control what is connected...
customer_reviews.author: active

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It randomly stopped producing a wireless signal one day. I spent hours on the phone with my wireless provider, then with Linksys support. No one was helpful and left me with the basic answer that this device was defective. I highly recommend not buying this and am asking the seller to refund/replace!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Howard

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect it to connect to Apple products (iPhone, iPad, mac). It is not a network problem, it's the router. Contacted Linksys for the issue (since it's already beyond return) and they say the problem has been escalated because it is one of their recent devices and not all techs are familiar with it. Oh and they haven't called me back; all I know is that it's escalated. Point is, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Dont expect good 5G
customer_reviews.text: The 2.4GHZ connection is far more stable. And honestly, i believe my overall connection lowered compared to my outdated modem and separate router. I would say spend the little extra and get a better unit. This is definitely not a setup for any type of gamer. Not a happy purchase, but because it works, barely. I am not going to take a 15% restock fee. Don't Buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to pay your ISP to rent a router!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy and intuitive to set up. I had it up and going about three minutes after taking it out of the box. It enabled me to return my rented modem/router to Comcast, saving me $11 per month.
customer_reviews.author: mossum

customer_reviews.title: This Unit Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This unit has for 2 years been operating in a home operational environment with minimum difficulties including manual resetting of the unit from time to time. Otherwise no major malfunctions on quality, durability, reliability, & performance of internet communication 24/7 with very minimal downtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xfinity Certified
customer_reviews.text: Easy Easy! You need a laptop with Ethernet to step up. Put your password in, follow a few questions, that takes you to xfinity app to activate, will send you a code to your phone, put it in, and that's it. No call to Xfinity. This modem/gateway is faster than the xfinity supplied modem. I recommend this product to Xfinity customers.
customer_reviews.author: R Lester

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Wifi keeps dropping off. I was thinking it was my internet provider but NO its the modem. I now see that other people are having the same problem Now we're stuck with paying for a modem that doesn't work & can't return😡
customer_reviews.author: Alma Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great for someone who has never set up a network
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. I had never connected a network. The instructions made it easy. I can't compare it in relation to other router combos, but I can say that I am pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Owniing my own modem/router, getting better service, quality and value for the money paid
customer_reviews.text: This product has greatly improved my homes internet and WiFi service quality (it is now accessable and dependable).
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: supposedly certified to work with comcast xfinity, this modem ...
customer_reviews.text: supposedly certified to work with comcast xfinity, this modem would not exceed about 4Mbs. I even got comcast to bring out their own cabel modem to my house just to verify that there was no problem with the wiring. I work in technology and know what I'm doing, but the admin/config menu is so minimal that there really aren't even any configuration knobs to misconfigure. I returned this one and got a Motorola Model MB8600 instead, which has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: john molnar

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I love this Wifi router/ cable-modem. It's more capable than the speed I pay for (30Mbps), so it's scalable. The Wifi portion is easy to access from my smartphone where i can easily adjust mac filtering.
customer_reviews.author: DudeFromChicago

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable, and no support
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately after installing this one band of the wifi would cut out (the 2.4G) and then later the other would stop working. I upgraded the firmware to the latest release. It was fine for a while, then started again. At first it did it every month or so and rebooting took care of it. But it became more and more often, now it's virtually daily. Tuesday it'll be unplugged and tossed. Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HP B

customer_reviews.title: Too many bugs for an easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This is a preliminary review after about 10 days of using the new router. When it works, it works well. It was difficult to set up. The instructions are not complete enough to guide you through the process. I had to speak with a customer service rep for assistance. Last evening the router decided to forget all the network programming that I had done under the guidance of the service rep. I had to reset the modem and then go through the process again. When it is not working correcting, many devices do not "see" the router network and therefore cannot connect. We will see if things improve or get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, sleek appearance
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this product. thus far, the modem/router is space saving, elegant and a faster speed then previous modem.
customer_reviews.author: James Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with Xfinity
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. One for home and one for business. Switched to Comcast and didn't want to rent equipment. Good deal and works great.
customer_reviews.author: My time

customer_reviews.title: The routing and network software on this is very unreliable ...
customer_reviews.text: The routing and network software on this is very unreliable and needs to be rebooted more than once a week. I ended up hanging a separate router off of this and really only using it as a cable modem - and it still has problems (but it typically can go almost two weeks without a reboot). Especially frustrating as linksys doesn't really control the firmware - it is the comcast/xfinity/the cable company. Disappointing performance and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Heavner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy and it came with directions to register with Comcast cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This modem router is working very good. I can use my 100mbs internet service very ...
customer_reviews.text: This modem router is working very good. I can use my 100mbs internet service very well with the 5ghz wifi conexion. both the 5Ghz and 2.4Ghz wireless bands are working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, modem and WiFi work well. Some discussion in the manuals as to the advantages and disadvantages of various setup options would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this router.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for over 2 years now. I have to soft reset this device at least once a month because the 5G network disappears.
customer_reviews.author: Marsony Ali

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Although it took a while to get it up and running (thanks to the patience and diligence of TECH SUPPORT), this router works much better and has a more stable WiFi connection than some of its other counterparts from well-known brands. LINKSYS all the way!!! HAHA!
customer_reviews.author: Harold D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product works good with Comcast got this for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product works good with Comcast got this for my brothers studio while going to college and he has had no issues making sure his homework, TV and gaming is all taken care of at a high efficient speed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product, even worse customer service.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to spend all morning on the phone to finally discover that your modem/router is defective, and that you'll receive a replacement 10 business days after they receive the defective product back, then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great and fast router for the money (good value)
customer_reviews.text: The setup was very easy. Provides much faster WI-FI than my previous 802.11 n router. I connected very easily through Xfinity, been working great the past three months.
customer_reviews.author: James358

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the sealed box. Returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of the sealed box. Returned and bought another...failed shortly after getting it working...switching back to Netgear.
customer_reviews.author: Niceone608

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for all of our devices
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps this works just fine with a smaller number of devices or non-Apple products. In my case, heavy users of Mac products, we struggled to find the wireless and stay connected to the internet. I use Xfinity.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Cowley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works best, huge range even out of my home. Very stable signal
customer_reviews.author: Oscar O.

customer_reviews.title: Very slow.  Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I didn't want to rent another modem. It runs very slow. If I do a Speed test it shows it is running at or near what I am paying for but everything on my laptop takes forever to load. Roku constantly drops. I have had faster dial-up. Was trying to save some money on an all in one wifi/modem. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this but I do have to reset it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: P.o.s dont waste your time buying!
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk barley got a year out of it now I'm stuck resetting the router everyday! I've tried master resetting back to factory nothing works.. almost ever 3 hours I have to reset this piece of crap! Should have never bought this was better off renting the one from Xfinity!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas bushnell

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Works great, better than Xfinity's router. The only negative is it came with the incorrect default wifi name and password. Luckily I was able to plug in directly and get connected. This router is also no capable of using the Linksys app.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ireland

customer_reviews.title: My own modem Router!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought my own modem router - it works great and the help we received from the help desk for the router was so easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had memo problems with this item... Had had no problems with picking up signal thus far... And it also looks nice... Would recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Pearl McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Good for cable and basic internet use
customer_reviews.text: We had minor issues with WiFi when we first installed. I took away one star for that, but it seemed to have worked itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Lainie0827

customer_reviews.title: Unstable product
customer_reviews.text: The product requires constant restarting to reestablish connections be it wired or wireless. There is no firmware update - manufacturer expects the ISP to do so which has not yet happened in a year plus of me owning this product. I would stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. FAULTY PUMA 6 CHIPSET.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEM/ROUTER. It is equipped with faulty hardware. Google "puma 6 chipset class action lawsuit"
customer_reviews.author: Drummer dude

customer_reviews.title: Linksys quality I’ve come to expect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use and setup for this combo modem/router. It consistently provides great signal.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the fast shipping, and it arrived intact. It was easy to set up with comcast, i followed the instructions included and it was simple. This is great because i wanted an all in one, modem and router.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brethauer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great price
customer_reviews.text: It works great, not a problem but I’ve only been using it for a few months. It puts a strong signal out for a good distance. It’s what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, Super fast modem. Security is easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: If you want internet, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Decent internet speed and up time, works great for watching naked bipedal apes wrestle on your phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is bad!
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of problem to set it up and it stops emitting wifi signals. In addition ,the phone number for assistance doesn't answer. I am really disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line:  It works as advertised - Yay!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, but it helps to be a bit tech-savvy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Flower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: I recently had cable internet installed into my home. I had a coworker help me choose a decent modem/router and this is what he chose. So far, it's working flawlessly. I have steel mesh and plaster walls to which my WiFi dongle couldn't reach my PC. This time, I had the internet installed in the room where the PC is and hoped the Xbox could have a decent connection through my walls. When testing with the cable guy, it worked no problem! Everywhere in the house can be reached! Awesome so far!
customer_reviews.author: Vader D

customer_reviews.title: This device does not work with Cox Communications even though ...
customer_reviews.text: This device does not work with Cox Communications even though Linksys support says it’s “coming soon.” Waited 4 months and it still doesn’t work with Cox.
customer_reviews.author: HoaxPokes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I waisted $$$$ on this product --- doesn't work. is NOT compatible with COMCAST, and I couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: JGL

customer_reviews.title: Swift easy set-up and high speed internet
customer_reviews.text: Liked the quick response from Acute Tek when there was confusion about delivery. Loved the quick set-up and internet speed which is so much faster than Comcast's modem and router.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY MERCIER

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Set it up all by myself for Xfinity... That's saying something. Hasn't stopped working or slowed down at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Not at expected level
customer_reviews.text: It is working but some times could not get signal.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Drops signal frequently
customer_reviews.text: Similar issues to those already posted. Modem works fine when it is working but constantly drops the internet signal and requires a restart.
customer_reviews.author: William Travis Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great modem/router
customer_reviews.text: Love this modem/router so far it's a beast! Simple setup! Fast speeds!
customer_reviews.author: D4rK_v01D

customer_reviews.title: If I can get it exchanged as seems defective
customer_reviews.text: Unit keeps loosing WiFi connection and we have to restart it every time that happens.. Gets annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. Much faster than my Comcast provided modem/router.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This item dose exactly what it say and give me great internet speed I would say I got my money’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: cost was good
customer_reviews.text: what i like is this modem has save me money easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loses connection to internet. Requires restart at least once a day
customer_reviews.author: dsharp9115

customer_reviews.title: Already registered
customer_reviews.text: Xfinity says the device is already registered to someone else when it's suppose to be new. Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it would be slower than my rental modem but that's not the case at all. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Cant be certain if it is defective or just poor quality. We have to reboot it multiple times a day due to loss of signal. I purchased because t was on the list of modems for Comcast and description states "Ample bandwidth for HD video streaming, online gaming, and other Wi-Fi data-heavy activities " - this is not true for us. If you have more than 1 or 2 devices going at the same time it has very poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Often reboots and restarts automatically
customer_reviews.text: The speed and specs are good... but the modem often restarts by itself ... I guess the firmware upgrade might fix this issue ... I am not sure
customer_reviews.author: Deepa Prabhakaran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of hardware for those who have internet service with Xfinity and Spectrum! Works great for my requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ynoa

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work if you ha ve a phone jack
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my phone now I'm stuck with like.throwing money into the trash
customer_reviews.author: Laura Todd

customer_reviews.title: Save you money and put it onto a different option
customer_reviews.text: Its garbage, get the Motorola MG7550 works 10x better than this one did.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: frequent disconnection on Android handled devices.
customer_reviews.text: frequent disconnection on Android handled devices. Works fine with laptops though
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Samarth

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok and support tech from linksys was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage can not maintain a wireless signal for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with Comcast. No wall-mount though, so it just stands on my table.
customer_reviews.author: Styopa Semenukha

customer_reviews.title: WiFi issues, potentially depending on ISP. Can't update firmware yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Spectrum customer here and an IT pro. This devices firmware is supplied by your ISP. So if you have any compatibility issues (normally addressed by firmware updates) your at the mercy of your ISP to get updated firmware. I have a Nexus 6p and Google Pixel XL that have issue and I have the latest firmware. Your luck may differ or newer firmware may be available by the time you read this, however all devices concerned here have been out for a while... A Chrome Cast and Chrome Cast Ultra, as well as two laptops worked juts fine. Not worth fighting my ISP for a potentially simple fix so this is getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Spectrum could see the router, however couldn't get it working. essentially not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Alindskoog

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for 1 month, and now the network keeps disappearing. Waste of $180
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a direct Comcast replacement
customer_reviews.text: I am sure it would work for internet, but doesn't have the phone capability that I needed so I returned it. It's not a direct replacement for the one that Comcast rents.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Christopher

product_meta.title: Linksys High Speed DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 AC1900 Cable Modem Router, Certified for Xfinity by Comcast and Spectrum by Charter (CG7500)
product_meta.description: The 2 in 1 AC1900 Wi Fi Cable Modem Router combines aDOCSIS 3.0 24x8 cable modem and an ultra fast AC router intone convenient, high performance device. By combining a cable modem and router, there are fewer devices taking up space on your tabletop and more money in your pocket. Ideal for busy households with multiple connected devices, the Wi Fi cable modem router offers ample bandwidth for streaming, online gaming, and other data heavy activities. With simple setup, you will enjoy more powerful Wi Fi speed within minutes.
feature_bullets: Combines a AC1900 Wi Fi Router with DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 modem into a 2 in 1 space saving, high performance device
Experience high speed Wi Fi speeds from your existing ISP plans up to 300 Mbps. Ample bandwidth for HD video streaming, online gaming, and other Wi Fi data heavy activities
Simple plug and play setup: Get started right out of the box with no CD setup
Compatible with Comcast, Spectrum and Xfinity

specifications.Wireless Type: 5 GHz Radio Frequency, 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
